Class SystemFontSource

      com.aspose.words.SystemFontSource

public class SystemFontSource 
extends FontSourceBase

Represents all TrueType fonts installed to the system.

Property Getters/Setters Detail

getPriority

→ inherited from FontSourceBase
public int getPriority()
Returns the font source priority.

This value is used when there are fonts with the same family name and style in different font sources. In this case Aspose.Words selects the font from the source with the higher priority value.

The default value is 0.

getType

public int getType()
Returns the type of the font source. The value of the property is FontSourceType integer constant.
Method Detail

getAvailableFonts

→ inherited from FontSourceBase
public System.Collections.Generic.IList`1[[Aspose.Words.Fonts.PhysicalFontInfo, Aspose.Words, Version=18.8.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=716fcc553a201e56]] getAvailableFonts()
Returns list of fonts available via this source.

getSystemFontFolders

public static java.lang.String[] getSystemFontFolders()
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
Returns system font folders or empty array if folders are not accessible. On some platforms Aspose.Words could search system fonts not only through folders but in other sources too. For example, on Windows platform Aspose.Words search fonts also in the registry.
